mapper.sql: goods_id, total_number, out_number, leave_number, xianghu_number, nanyang_number, qibao_number, fault_one_number, fault_two_number, reworking_number, rework_number, overhaul_number, scrap_number
mapper.insert: insert into wms_goods_statistics(goods_id, total_number, out_number, leave_number, xianghu_number, nanyang_number, qibao_number, fault_one_number,fault_two_number, reworking_number, rework_number, overhaul_number, scrap_number) values(#{goodsId}, #{totalNumber}, #{outNumber}, #{leaveNumber}, #{xianghuNumber}, #{nanyangNumber}, #{qibaoNumber}, #{faultOneNumber},#{faultTwoNumber}, #{reworkingNumber}, #{reworkNumber}, #{overhaulNumber}, #{scrapNumber})
mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.goods_id, t1.total_number, t1.out_number, t1.leave_number, t1.xianghu_number, t1.nanyang_number, t1.qibao_number, t1.fault_one_number,t1.fault_two_number, t1.reworking_number, t1.rework_number, t1.overhaul_number, t1.scrap_number,t2.GOOD_CODE, t2.GOOD_NAME, t2.GOOD_RYPE, t2.GOOD_SIZE, t2.GOOD_VALUE, t2.GOOD_CAR_NUMBER, t2.GOOD_IMPORTANCE from wms_goods_statistics t1 right join wms_goods t2 on t1.goods_id = t2.GOOD_ID where t1.id = #{id}

select t1.id, t1.goods_id, t1.total_number, t1.out_number, t1.leave_number, t1.xianghu_number, t1.nanyang_number, t1.qibao_number, t1.fault_one_number,t1.fault_two_number, t1.reworking_number, t1.rework_number, t1.overhaul_number, t1.scrap_number,t2.GOOD_CODE, t2.GOOD_NAME, t2.GOOD_RYPE, t2.GOOD_SIZE, t2.GOOD_CAR_NUMBER, t2.GOOD_IMPORTANCE from wms_goods_statistics t1 left join wms_goods t2 on t1.goods_id = t2.GOOD_ID where t2.GOOD_NAME like concat(concat("%",#{goodName},"%"))

select t1.id, t1.goods_id, t1.total_number, t1.out_number, t1.leave_number, t1.xianghu_number, t1.nanyang_number, t1.qibao_number, t1.fault_one_number,t1.fault_two_number, t1.reworking_number, t1.rework_number, t1.overhaul_number, t1.scrap_number,t2.GOOD_CODE, t2.GOOD_NAME, t2.GOOD_RYPE, t2.GOOD_SIZE, t2.GOOD_CAR_NUMBER, t2.GOOD_IMPORTANCE from wms_goods_statistics t1 left join wms_goods t2 on t1.goods_id = t2.GOOD_ID where t2.GOOD_NAME = #{goodName} limit 1

select t1.id, t1.goods_id, t1.total_number, t1.out_number, t1.leave_number, t1.xianghu_number, t1.nanyang_number, t1.qibao_number, t1.fault_one_number,t1.fault_two_number, t1.reworking_number, t1.rework_number, t1.overhaul_number, t1.scrap_number,t2.GOOD_CODE, t2.GOOD_NAME, t2.GOOD_RYPE, t2.GOOD_SIZE, t2.GOOD_CAR_NUMBER, t2.GOOD_IMPORTANCE from wms_goods_statistics t1 left join wms_goods t2 on t1.goods_id = t2.GOOD_ID where t1.goods_id = #{goodId} limit 1

select t1.id, t1.goods_id, t1.total_number, t1.out_number, t1.leave_number, t1.xianghu_number, t1.nanyang_number, t1.qibao_number, t1.fault_one_number,t1.fault_two_number, t1.reworking_number, t1.rework_number, t1.overhaul_number, t1.scrap_number,t2.GOOD_CODE, t2.GOOD_NAME, t2.GOOD_RYPE, t2.GOOD_SIZE, t2.GOOD_CAR_NUMBER, t2.GOOD_IMPORTANCE from wms_goods_statistics t1 left join wms_goods t2 on t1.goods_id = t2.GOOD_ID
